withFilters.title: Listing in {{category}} Category
withFilters.description: With Turistikrota, you can review the listing in the {{category}} category and make a reservation.

status.unavailable: This ad is not available for these dates and this number of people.

price.not-available-filtered: Price not available for this date
price.filterForStrict: Filter by date for clear prices

category.title: Listing Categories
category.subtitle: In this section, you can see the categories related to the listing.

rules.title: Listing Rules
rules.subtitle: In this section, you can see the rules related to the listing.

calendar.title: Price Calendar
calendar.subtitle: In this section, you can see the seasonal prices related to the listing.

map.title: Map and Nearby Areas
map.subtitle: In this section, you can see the location of the listing and nearby attractions.

error.title: An Error Occurred
error.description: There was an error loading the map. Please try again later.

warning.title: Warning
warning.description: Before making a reservation, review the listing rules and ensure this listing is suitable for you.

validation.title: Special Rules
validation.subtitle: In this section, you can enter special rules for your listing.

onlyFamily.title: Only Families
onlyFamily.description: This listing is exclusive for families. Those not in a family cannot reserve this listing.

noPet.title: No Pets
noPet.description: This listing does not accept pets.

noSmoke.title: No Smoking
noSmoke.description: Those who reserve this listing cannot smoke during their stay.

noAlcohol.title: No Alcohol
noAlcohol.description: Those who reserve this listing cannot consume alcohol during their stay.

noParty.title: No Parties
noParty.description: Those who reserve this listing cannot organize parties here.

noUnmarried.title: No Unmarried Individuals
noUnmarried.description: Those who reserve this listing must be married.

noGuest.title: No Guests
noGuest.description: Those who reserve this listing cannot accept guests.
